projects.title: Business Intelligence
projects.description: I thrive on leveraging statistical methods, insights engines, and decision science to unlock valuable insights from disparate data sources. I excel in applying descriptive, predictive, and prescriptive analytics to drive strategic initiatives such as target market selection, new product introductions, customer retention, pricing, segmentation, and promotion. I am well-versed in utilizing data warehouses, data lakes, and cloud computing to efficiently manage and analyze data. Furthermore, I have a keen interest in exploring the potential of machine learning and artificial intelligence to further enhance decision-making processes in the realm of Business Intelligence.

projects.title: Information Technology
projects.description: I am deeply passionate about various aspects of software engineering, including coding infrastructure, cryptography, and data communications. I have a keen interest in exploring emerging technologies such as blockchains and open-source software. I am well-versed in software as a service (SaaS) models, content management, and designing user-friendly interfaces. Additionally, I have experience in client-side and server-side scripting, network connectivity, and network security. I am intrigued by areas such as web mail, e-commerce, and progressive web applications. Furthermore, I am fascinated by the concepts of short-term memory, long-term memory, storage, and cloud services, and their implications in the ever-evolving IT landscape.

projects.title: Music
projects.description: Music is my ultimate artistic expression, covering song, dance, composition, performance, and the music business, including copyright, publishing, and the recording industry. I joyfully create, perform, and deeply appreciate live music experiences at concerts and festivals. STAY TUNED for my SoundCloud tunes coming shortly, my stage name is @caRoh.
